ygData.subject: Re: Technobots

I had a feeling I was forgetting someone.

::::

The drunk watches Arty escape, and then looks back at the leaving Autobots. He transforms back into a lowrider and drives after them. (Them is Pacifix and co. The drunk just has slow reflexes.)



--- In nbwrpg@y..., rauq@t... wrote:
> --- Nosecone / Pacifix / Crossroads / Afterburner / Scattershot ---
> 
> Nosecone transforms, and pushes the debri off of him. The debri 
> slides to the ground beside him. "That was unfortunate," he dusts 
> himself off, and smiles.
> 
> Pacifix nods, and places the disabled bot into Ironhide. "He should 
> be out for a while, judging from his wounds." comments Pacifix. 
> 
> Crossroads explores the ship.
> 
> Afterburner and Scattershot follow Lightspeed and Hoist. They begin 
> picking up pieces of the roof and putting them into Hoist's back end.van.
